headline: Albemarle Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Albemarle (NYSE:ALB) reported fourth-quarter 2025 results that management said reflected double-digit volume growth, improved pricing in lithium, and ongoing cost and productivity gains, while also outlining a 2026 framework that links expected performance to three lithium price scenarios. headline: Albemarle Losses Narrow and Guidance Was Great. Why the Stock Is Down After Earnings.
summary: The wild ride for lithium investors continued after  Albemarle  reported its fourth-quarter earnings.  The quarter looked solid and the lithium miner’s guidance was impressive, but the stock was falling ahead of the open Thursday.  Losses narrowed as lithium prices rose.

raw.headline: Albemarle Losses Narrow and Guidance Was Great. Why the Stock Is Down After Earnings.
